Token.Abstract: the app key given to developers for this specific app on http://developer.catalyze.io

Parameter.Name: applicationKey
Parameter.Abstract: the app key given to developers for this specific app on http://developer.catalyze.io

Parameter.Name: scheme
Parameter.Abstract: the url scheme used for login callbacks that redirects a user back to their application on successful authentication

Parameter.Name: appId
Parameter.Abstract: the id of the application on the catalyze.io API

Token.Abstract: the app key set by the developer in application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:

ReturnValue.Abstract: the app key set by the developer in application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:

Token.Abstract: the url scheme set by the developer in application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:

ReturnValue.Abstract: the url scheme set by the developer in application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:

Token.Abstract: the app id set by the developer in application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:

ReturnValue.Abstract: the app id set by the developer in application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:

Token.Abstract: After authentication, the User is directed back to the application. The method application:handleOpenURL: is called in the App Delegate file. Passing this URL onto this method takes care of the rest. The result block indicates if authentication was successful or not.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: the URL that the catalyze.io API redirected the User to after authentication

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the block that is performed after all values are saved from the given URL
